title: The Logos as Objective Enchantment: Spirit as Invisible Nature and Nature as Visible Spirit
description: Matt is continuing on with his writing of screen plays and we toss around philosophical and literary ideas ranging from Kierkegaard's non-identical repetition and Schilling's views on spirit and nature. We take the metaphor of the tree as an example of the meeting of the real and the ideal, and the relationship between the inside and the outside.
